Sentencas: The CeO2-Sm2O3 based materials are widely applied in the solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC), oxygen sensors and thermal barrier coatings fields, but the phase diagram of CeO2-Sm2O3 at elevated temperatures has not been systematically studied.
Titulo: Phase relationships of the CeO2-Sm2O3 system at 1200 °C to 1600 °C in air

Sentencas: In order to determine the phase relationship of the pseudo binary system CeO2-Sm2O3, seventeen samples with different compositions were prepared and then separately annealed at 1200, 1400 and 1600 degrees C, followed by air-cooling in this study.
Titulo: Phase relationships of the CeO2-Sm2O3 system at 1200 °C to 1600 °C in air

Sentencas: The phase analyses are carried out with the support of X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and electron probe microanalysis (EPMA).
Titulo: Phase relationships of the CeO2-Sm2O3 system at 1200 °C to 1600 °C in air

Sentencas: It is found that three different solid solutions exist in the samples, namely monoclinic Sm2O3 (B), cubic Sm2O3 (C) and fluorite CeO2 (F).
Titulo: Phase relationships of the CeO2-Sm2O3 system at 1200 °C to 1600 °C in air

Sentencas: The lattice parameters and phase boundaries of the homogeneous regions are determined between 1200 and 1600 degrees C. Experimentally determined phase diagram of CeO2-Sm2O3 system is provided in the end.
Titulo: Phase relationships of the CeO2-Sm2O3 system at 1200 °C to 1600 °C in air
